content: उपजन् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be born or produced, originate, arise, grow; उष्मणश्चोपजायंते <ls>Ms. 1. 45</ls>; <ls>H. Pr. 44</ls>; संगस्तेषुपजायते <ls>Bg. 2. 62</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">14. 11.</ls> {@--2@} To happen, take place, become visible, appear; प्राणविपत्तिरुपजायते <ls>K. 160.</ls> {@--3@} To be or become, be or exist; सतीत्वमुपजायते <ls>Pt. 1. 138.</ls> {@--4@} To be born again; सर्गेपि नोपजायंते <ls>Bg. 14. 2</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 256.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (जनयति) To produce, cause, rouse; उत्तराप्रलापोपजनितकृपः <ls>K. 175.</ls>
